description:
Sleep above stones, puddles, thorns and nocturnal creatures. Hang this lightweight hammock at a campsite or in your backyard for overnights or short siestas. The 2-person model is great for lounging with a friend or using as a compact backpacking shelter.

  • Lightweight, tear-resistant GravitasX™ 40-denier diamond ripstop nylon resists stretching and is made from 100% recycled materials
  • Crinkle treatment ensures out-of-the-package softness
  • DWR finish protects from condensation and dew, ensuring the hammock dries quickly
  • Diamond Shell X™ roll-top compression stuff sack is water resistant
  • 6 bar tacked gear loops let you attach other gear
  • Includes Kanga Claws™ carabiners and Dyneema Racer Slings™ for secure rigging
  • Hanging straps, bug net and hammock tarp sold separately
name: Kammok Roo Double XL Hammock
